sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Clears all the text in a text box specified by widgetID. The widgetID parameter must be the widget id of a text box.
sections.text_content: Clears all the text in a text box specified by widgetID. The widgetID parameter must be the widget id of a text box.
sections.mdown_content: Clears all the text in a text box specified by *widgetID*. The *widgetID* parameter must be the widget id of a text box.

sections.title: Example
code:
import GUI
        var boxID, buttonID, start : int
        start := 1
        
        procedure PrintTwentyFive
            GUI.ClearText (boxID)
            for i : start .. start + 24
                GUI.AddLine (boxID, intstr (i))
            end for
            start += 25
        end PrintTwentyFive
        
        boxID := GUI.CreateTextBox (50, 50, 200, 200)
        buttonID := GUI.CreateButton (50, 5, 0, "Next 25", PrintTwentyFive)
        PrintTwentyFive
        loop
            exit when GUI.ProcessEvent
        end loop
sections.raw_content: The program lists 25 numbers in a text box. Every time the button is pressed, it clears the text box and prints the next 25 numbers.
